pins.label: Pin 1A
pins.description: Terminal 1, side A. Internally connected to Pin 1B.

pins.label: Pin 1B
pins.description: Terminal 1, side B. Internally connected to Pin 1A.

pins.label: Pin 2A
pins.description: Terminal 2, side A. Internally connected to Pin 2B. Connects to Terminal 1 when button is pressed.

pins.label: Pin 2B
pins.description: Terminal 2, side B. Internally connected to Pin 2A. Connects to Terminal 1 when button is pressed.
